greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of terms in Zeckendorf expansion needed to write the second Fibonacci based variant of arithmetic derivative of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
program: A072649(n) = { my(m); if(n<1, 0, m=0; until(fibonacci(m)>n, m++); m-2); }; \\ From A072649
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 29 2019
